homePage.heroSubtitle:
Fullstack Developer focused on design, structure, and performance. I combine visual clarity with technical precision.

My goal: digital products that inspire and deliver reliability.

card-0.title: Tech Skills
card-0.description: For 2-3 years, I have been actively working with JavaScript and TypeScript, both frontend and backend. Previously, I gained several years of experience with OOP in C#, and my journey started with Java.

card-1.title: Projects
card-1.description: Currently, I am working on a fullstack smart home system that will soon be open source. Additionally, I have initial experiments with mobile apps and various web, desktop, and experimental projects.

card-2.title: Soft Skills
card-2.description: Teamwork and communication are important to me - I enjoy collaborating on projects. I tackle problems creatively and am always motivated to learn new things and overcome challenges.

card-3.title: Creative Skills
card-3.description: Creative in UI/UX design - I love bringing interfaces to life in Figma. I enjoy experimenting playfully with animations and interactive projects.

card-4.title: Learning
card-4.description: Always curious and motivated to learn - currently diving into IoT device communication via sockets and MQTT, as well as exploring new JS frameworks. Continuously deepening TypeScript knowledge.

card-5.title: Fun / Extras
card-5.description: Open source, small experiments, and gaming projects are part of my hobbies. I love trying out creative ideas and developing new things playfully.

contactPage.title: Let's get In Touch!
contactPage.subtitle: I'm excited about interesting projects, collaborations, or just a friendly exchange. Feel free to send me a message - I'll get back to you as soon as possible!
contactPage.manually: Or just reach out manually to

form.title: Contact me
form.description: Just enter your data and a message :)

toast.error: An error occured while trying to send your message!

fullName.min: Full name must be at least 5 characters long.
fullName.max: Full name must be at most 32 characters long.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address.

message.min: Message must be at least 10 characters long.
message.max: Message must be at most 600 characters long.
